ClassDesc: Utility class for @B_android#support#v7#widget#helper#ItemTouchHelper_E@ which handles item transformations for different API versions. This class has methods that map to @B_android#support#v7#widget#helper#ItemTouchHelper#Callback_E@'s drawing methods. Default implementations in @B_android#support#v7#widget#helper#ItemTouchHelper#Callback_E@ call these methods with @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#ViewHolder#itemView_E@ and @B_android#support#v7#widget#helper#ItemTouchUIUtil_E@ makes necessary changes on the View depending on the API level. You can access the instance of @B_android#support#v7#widget#helper#ItemTouchUIUtil_E@ via @B_android#support#v7#widget#helper#ItemTouchHelper#Callback#getDefaultUIUtil_E@ and call its methods with the children of ViewHolder that you want to apply default effects.
